dependencies.description:
BCFtools is a set of utilities that manipulate variant calls in the
Variant Call Format (VCF) and its binary counterpart BCF. All commands
work transparently with both VCFs and BCFs, both uncompressed and BGZF-
compressed.
dependencies.name: bcftools

dependencies.description: Basic Local Alignment Search Tool.
dependencies.name: blast-plus

dependencies.description: Burrow-Wheeler Aligner for pairwise alignment between DNA sequences.
dependencies.name: bwa

dependencies.description:
MUSCLE is one of the best-performing multiple alignment programs
according to published benchmark tests, with accuracy and speed that are
consistently better than CLUSTALW.
dependencies.name: muscle

dependencies.description:
Primer3 is a widely used program for designing PCR primers (PCR =
"Polymerase Chain Reaction"). PCR is an essential and ubiquitous tool in
genetics and molecular biology. Primer3 can also design hybridization
probes and sequencing primers.
dependencies.name: primer3

dependencies.description: Python flexible slugify function
dependencies.name: py-awesome-slugify

dependencies.description:
A distributed collaborative effort to develop Python libraries and
applications which address the needs of current and future work in
bioinformatics.
dependencies.name: py-biopython

dependencies.description: Python Command-line Application Tools
dependencies.name: py-clint

dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.
dependencies.name: py-cython

dependencies.description: fast vcf parsing with cython + htslib
dependencies.name: py-cyvcf2

dependencies.description: Command-line interface description language.
dependencies.name: py-docopt

dependencies.description: Editable interval tree data structure for Python 2 and 3.
dependencies.name: py-intervaltree

dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.
dependencies.name: py-jinja2

dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.
dependencies.name: py-matplotlib

dependencies.description:
NetworkX is a Python package for the creation, manipulation, and study
of the structure, dynamics, and functions of complex networks.
dependencies.name: py-networkx

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.
dependencies.name: py-requests

dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-scipy

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: Pretty-print tabular data
dependencies.name: py-tabulate

dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.
dependencies.name: py-wheel

dependencies.description: YAHMM is a HMM package for Python, implemented in Cython for speed.
dependencies.name: py-yahmm

dependencies.description: The Python programming language.
dependencies.name: python

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependencies.description:
SAM Tools provide various utilities for manipulating alignments in the
SAM format, including sorting, merging, indexing and generating
alignments in a per-position format
dependencies.name: samtools

dependencies.description:
VCFtools is a program package designed for working with VCF files, such
as those generated by the 1000 Genomes Project. The aim of VCFtools is
to provide easily accessible methods for working with complex genetic
variation data in the form of VCF files.
dependencies.name: vcftools

description:
VCF-kit is a command-line based collection of utilities for performing
analysis on Variant Call Format (VCF) files.
name: py-vcf-kit

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
